definition: to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw

sentences.english: The 2nd day asks to decline goods and cost of compensatory medical treatment and mental loss to bazaar.
sentences.chinese: 第二日到商场要求退货和赔偿医疗费和精神损失。

sentences.english: The next section to the right contains the AUX RETURNS.
sentences.chinese: 下一节包括的权益的AUX退货。

sentences.english: The return destination for RMA service is SHENZEN.
sentences.chinese: 授权退货服务之退货目的地为深圳。

sentences.english: The return destination for RMA service is SHENZEN.
sentences.chinese: 授权退货服务之退货目的地为深圳。

sentences.english: Wan also said the company will not take the product off shelves or accept any returns.
sentences.chinese: 万玉华说，不会对产品进行下架或退货处理。

sentences.english: Not accept replacment once cosumer goods was opened or damaged.
sentences.chinese: 本公司不接受巳开封或经人为损坏之退货要求。

sentences.english: If you do not return to the bad comments buyer insists on appeal can I do?
sentences.chinese: 如果不退货买家执意给差评我可以申诉吗？

sentences.english: Gifts redeemed are non-returnable and cannot be exchanged for cash.
sentences.chinese: 兑换的礼品不可退货或退换现金。

sentences.english: Sorry, We don't take returns on sale items.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我们不接受销价出售的物品的退货。

sentences.english: If the shoes don’t fit you, you can exchange within seven days with receipt.
sentences.chinese: 如果鞋子不适合你，您可凭收据七天内退货。

sentences.english: I'm afraid there are no returns at all on sale merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕根本就没有接受销价商品退货这一款。

sentences.english: We don't take returns on sale items.
sentences.chinese: 我们不接受销价出售的物品的退货。

sentences.english: Gifts redeemed are non-returnable and cannot be exchanged for cash.
sentences.chinese: 礼品不设退货或退换现金。

sentences.english: If we have refunds agreements, you will be responsible for the return shipping charges.
sentences.chinese: 如果达成退货退款协议，本公司会收取货品退回运费。

sentences.english: Many channels shangdu ask to return money.
sentences.chinese: 很多渠道商都要求退货。

sentences.english: Still, many customers have had positive experiences.
sentences.chinese: 不过，仍有许多顾客对退货服务比较满意。

definition: to return a product for another item
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to guarantee refund or replacement (of faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to reject (visa application etc)/(commerce) to return to sender/item returned to sender
to guarantee refund (for faulty or unsatisfactory goods)
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
